Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: â€¢ Hey guys, let me give you the hot goss! In Australia, the Reserves Bank happened to pause their "on-hold" rates, which can't be considered as the end of the road for the interest rate hikes. The ASX 200 index recorded seven gains in thirteen months, however, businesses are urging the RBA to halt the consecutive hikes due to the sharp decline in orders. Stay tuned because the RBA faces important decisions regarding interest rates in May!
